info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 12 at 5:44PM MDT until August 12 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... South central Grant County in southwestern New Mexico... Southwestern Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... Central Hidalgo County in southwestern New Mexico...
* Until 630 PM MDT.
* At 544 PM MDT, a dust channel was 4 miles west of Hachita, moving south at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Doppler radar.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 21 and 71.
Locations impacted include... Lordsburg, Cotton City, Hachita, Rodeo, Animas, Playas, Gage, Separ, Windmill, Lordsburg Playa, Granite Gap, Pyramid Mountains, Hachita Valley, Camp Ramsey, and Pitchfork Ranch.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:30 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:30 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Grant, NM; Hidalgo, NM; Luna, NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:30 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:30 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Grant, NM; Hidalgo, NM; Luna, NM
